# AI Tutorials

> End-to-end tutorials for building AI-powered .NET applications. Covers RAG patterns with vector search using Azure Cosmos DB, integrating OpenAI models, and building chat applications with custom data. Tutorials use `Microsoft.Extensions.AI` and Semantic Kernel.

- [Tutorial](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/tutorials/tutorial-ai-vector-search.md): Create a simple recipe app using the RAG pattern and vector search using Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.
